I was reading how you are doing your new podcast for Angular, and I’m sure you and your co-host are probably always breaking your brains for new content. I am currently working on a very large enterprise level AngularJS application for CenturyLink. I’m the sole front end dev. on it, and I have learned a lot in the process with an application this size. Our planned launch is end of year.

I’d be more than happy to further discuss the possibility of being on the show, if you are at all interested, for some topic/topics. I actually gave a meetup presentation on Angular in the Enterprise about 2 or so months ago that I could generate some content ideas from if necessary.

I noticed on your github profile that your based in Orlando. I’m actually going to be in Orlando next weekend with my wife and son on a short out of town trip, and I could meet you for coffee even, to discuss further in person. Thoughts?

Anyways, hope this message receives you well.
